tool_description: Cleans, transforms, and prepares raw sales data for price elasticity analysis by handling missing values, outliers, and data normalization.

data_source.description: Source identifier or path to raw sales data

outlier_method.description: Method for outlier detection: iqr, zscore, isolation_forest

missing_value_strategy.description: Strategy for handling missing values: drop, interpolate, forward_fill

normalization.description: Whether to normalize price and quantity data

aggregation_level.description: Time aggregation level: daily, weekly, monthly

error_messages: Invalid data source: Cannot access or parse the specified data source
Insufficient data: Less than 30 data points remaining after preprocessing
Invalid method: outlier_method must be one of [iqr, zscore, isolation_forest]
Invalid strategy: missing_value_strategy must be one of [drop, interpolate, forward_fill]
Invalid aggregation: aggregation_level must be one of [daily, weekly, monthly]
usage: Provide data_source and optionally configure preprocessing parameters. Returns cleaned dataset ready for elasticity analysis.

outliers_removed.description: Number of outliers detected and removed

data_quality_score.description: Overall data quality score from 0 to 1
